translations: n．（鸡）咯咯叫声：鸡发出的一种声音。
· The clucks of the hens filled the barnyard.
母鸡的咯咯叫声充满了谷仓。
v．（鸡）发出咯咯叫声：鸡发出的一种声音。
· The hen clucks to call her chicks.
母鸡咯咯叫唤她的小鸡。

sentences.sentence: Each time he does a loop, he clucks twice.
sentences.translation: 先巡游一次，然后再转回来两次。

sentences.sentence: A hen clucks lougly after it has laid an egg.
sentences.translation: 一只母鸡下蛋后就咯咯叫。

sentences.sentence: Once the modem's screeches, clucks and beeps ended and I was connected to AOL's servers, all my friends would be right there, ready to chat.
sentences.translation: 一旦调制解调器发出刺耳的哔哔声，我就连上了美国在线(AOL)的服务器，我所有的朋友都会在那儿，做好了聊天的准备。
